numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph describes how often young men contact their parents.
2. The graph describes how often young women contact their parents.
3. The time span is from a day to a week.
4. The graph shows percentages for each gender group.
6. The 3 communication methods are texts and calls and in-person visits.
7. Texts are the most common communication method.
8. Women contact their parents more often than men.
9. I wonder why women contact their parents significantly more than men.
10. I wonder why the gender difference is big for texts and calls.
11. I wonder why the gender difference is not big for in-person visits.
12. Many of my peers will leave home soon for college.
13. I will leave home soon for college.
14. It is vital that we remember to check in on our parents.
15. It is vital that we talk to our parents now and then.
16. The headline is: Role shift, today's kids won't let go.
